Package mansionBandit.gameWorld.areas

Interface Summary
MansionArea MansionArea is simply a space within the mansion, either a room or hallway
 

Class Summary
Grid This class makes the rooms and fits them together depending on the amount of rooms wanted by the user
Hallway This class is a hallway in the mansion and has links to other hallways and or rooms A hallway connects to any surrounding area unless it is a wall.
Map This class creates a visual representation of the mansion
Room This is a room object that has links to other areas and shows what objects are held in the room
StartSpace This is a type of mansionarea where the bandits start off, There are four start points , meaning we can have a maximum of four players
